snippet: The lawyer for a New York police officer arrested in India for having three rounds of ammunition said that there was no connection between the case and the arrest of an Indian diplomat in New York last year.
abstract: Lawyer for New York police officer Manuel Encarnacion, arrested in New Delhi, India, for having three rounds of ammunition in his luggage, says there is no connection between the case and the 2013 arrest of Indian diplomat Devyani Khobragade in New York.

byline.original: By EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS and GARDINER HARRIS

lead_paragraph: The lawyer for a New York police officer arrested in India for having three rounds of ammunition said that there was no connection between the case and the arrest of an Indian diplomat in New York last year.

headline.main: Lawyer Sees No Revenge in an Arrest in New Delhi
headline.print_headline: Lawyer Sees No Revenge in an Arrest in New Delhi
